T02D2867:207b-0: @207b // mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2867:207b-1: gang gi stobs kyis gdug pa 'joms byed pa //
T02D2867:207b-2: mthu stobs dbang phyug rdo rje can la 'dud //
T02D2867:207b-3: 'gro ba 'di kun phal cher gnod mang ba //
T02D2867:207b-4: de sel bdud rtsi 'di ni brjod par bya //
T02D2867:207b-5: rig pa 'dzin pa nyams dga'i phyogs 'dug nas //
T02D2867:207b-6: rnam par sbyangs pa'i sa gzhi dag pa la //
T02D2867:207b-7: rab sngo mchod pa'i rten sogs mdun byas nas //
T02D2867:207b-8: thub dbang rdo rje'i bdag po'i go 'chang ba //
T02D2867:207b-9: bsod nams tshogs bdun rab tu rdzogs byas nas //
T02D2867:207b-10: de rjes su ni sngar nyid padma'i rang bzhin snying gar pam las der bsam bya //
T02D2867:207b-11: de dkyil ram las byung ba'i tsha zer can ni dmar po bltas byas nas //
T02D2867:207b-12: der ni srog gi rang bzhin ye shes lnga yi dngos nyid yi ge h'um du blta //
T02D2867:207b-13: 'og tu dbugs nyid yam yig las skyes rab sngo gzhu 'dra ba //
T02D2867:207b-14: g-yo ba'i ba dan gyis mtshan de g-yos pas ni rab dkrugs nas //
T02D2867:207b-15: me yi rang bzhin nyi ma yang ni sbar byas h'um yig gis ni 'bar gyur bas //
T02D2867:207b-16: mthong dang reg pa'i dug sogs rgyu can nad kyi dngos bsregs nas //
T02D2867:207b-17: rab tu tsha ba'i me lce'i sgra las rigs pa'i sgra bsgrags la //
T02D2867:208a-0: ma yengs sems kyi skyon spangs sngags ni @208a * //
T02D2867:208a-2: dbugs ni 'byung dang rngub pa'i rlung gis lus kyi
T02D2867:208a-3: steng 'og cha ni rim bzhin bsreg / zla drug
T02D2867:208a-4: goms pas lus la drod thob la sogs mtshan ma
T02D2867:208a-5: bzang po rnyed // gso bar dka' ba'i nad rnams 'joms 'gyur sa mchog rnams kyang rim gyis 'thob//
T02D2867:208a-6: langs nas bza' tshe kha zas tshogs na gang gnod shar bsam bsreg par bya //
